Interface SnakeOrbs

All Known Implementing Classes:
BadOrb, BonusOrb, GoodOrb
public interface SnakeOrbs
Represents an interface for snake orbs in the game. Orbs have methods to manage their spawning, deletion, and state, as well as methods to retrieve their properties.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    active()
    Checks if the orb is currently active in the game.
    void
    delete()
    Deletes the orb, removing it from the game.
    int
    getBuffer()
    Gets the buffer value of the orb, to increment or decrement the snake
    int
    getScore()
    Gets the score value of the orb.
    int
    getX()
    Gets the x-coordinate of the orb's position.
    int
    getY()
    Gets the y-coordinate of the orb's position.
    void
    randomSpawn()
    Spawns the orb at a random location.

  • Method Details

    • randomSpawn

      void randomSpawn()
      Spawns the orb at a random location.

    • delete

      void delete()
      Deletes the orb, removing it from the game.

    • active

      boolean active()
      Checks if the orb is currently active in the game.
      Returns:
      true if the orb is active, false otherwise.

    • getScore

      int getScore()
      Gets the score value of the orb.
      Returns:
      the score value associated with this orb.

    • getBuffer

      int getBuffer()
      Gets the buffer value of the orb, to increment or decrement the snake
      Returns:
      the buffer value associated with this orb.

    • getX

      int getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the orb's position.
      Returns:
      the x-coordinate of the orb.

    • getY

      int getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the orb's position.
      Returns:
      the y-coordinate of the orb.
